name: Space Escape (Nidavellir Games)
description:
Summary

Somewhere in the universe, there you are in your spaceship. You are minding your Business as you do every day, collecting fuel and projectiles, whatever you need. But suddenly you see something from far away... oh no it's a black hole. Now hurry up and don't get hit by the asteroids. Or is everything inevitable in the end?

Controls Keyboard

WASD - Control Ship

Shift - Boost

Left Mouse Button/Space Bar - Shoot

Gamepad (not working in WebGL)

L-Stick - Control Ship

RB/R1 - Boost

A/X - Shoot

Team

Milmalissa - Digital Artist

manio - Music and Sound Director

ThePeat - Developer

Foreign Assets

Font - Space Font (https://www.fontspace.com/mandatory-plaything-font-f41315)

Additional features (spoiler or figure out by yourself)

Destroying rocks | Collecting canisters –> Extra Speed | extra tank volume

Getting hit by rocks –> Lose speed

Everything consumed by Black Hole –> Extra Speed for Black Hole

Shields –> +1 Shield | Slows down black hole | increases max shield amount after collecting 10 | lose 1 speed when shield gets shutdown
